document.full_text: a record number of big-game animals perished this winter in parts of montana, idaho and wyoming from a harsh season of unusually heavy snows and sustained cold in the northern rockies, state wildlife managers say.
document.title: record wildlife die-offs reported in northern rockies
lines_and_colors: a record number of big-game animals perished this winter in parts of montana, idaho and wyoming from a harsh season of unusually heavy snows and sustained cold in the northern rockies, state wildlife managers say.
